ODPs Reuse: Methodological Guidelines (VIII) 
18 
Taxonomy 
N-Ary Relation: 
New Class 
During the implementation activity we have 
reused the “N-ary Relation: New Class (LP-NR-
01)” pattern to  
a)represent logical structures that are not 
supported by the ontology language 
b)join concepts from different ontologies
speaker: SYSTEM
